tool_description: Records witness statements and testimonies related to workplace incidents, capturing detailed accounts with proper documentation and verification.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to associate statement with

witness_name.description: Full name of the witness providing statement

witness_role.description: Role or relationship to incident: employee, supervisor, contractor, visitor, bystander

statement_date.description: Date and time when statement was given

interviewer_name.description: Name of person conducting the interview

statement_method.description: How statement was recorded: written, audio, video, phone

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Invalid witness role: Must be one of [employee, supervisor, contractor, visitor, bystander].
Statement too brief: Witness statements must contain sufficient detail for investigation purposes.
Invalid statement date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and not before incident date.
Invalid statement method: Must be one of [written, audio, video, phone].
Missing interviewer information: Interviewer name is required for statement validity.
usage: Provide incident_id, witness_name, witness_role, statement_text, statement_date, and interviewer_name. Optionally specify statement_method and witness_contact. Creates documented witness statement record.

statement_id.description: Unique identifier for this witness statement

recording_timestamp.description: When the statement was recorded in system

verification_status.description: Whether statement has been verified or signed
